Hi Gary,

Thanks for providing additional information. 

The answer is yes. An example is the two new files we created for you, they can be seen here: 
https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Footer_Ocean_Underwriting_Logo_RGB-50.jpg
https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Footer_Ocean_Underwriting_Logo_RGB-66.jpg

In the event you wish you change how the URL appears, it's simply a matter of uploading the image with your preferred file name convention.

Will I be able to save new images in the media gallery and create a URL similar to the below to embed in the HTML for an email?

Subject: Email Template Pictures


Hi Sahil and Elizabeth

As I mentioned on today's call, we will need Ocean to host the pictures you provided (for the email body's) on an Ocean webserver. The reason is because Entsia do not have the capability to do this (unfortunately).




You will then need to give us the full URL path to each of the 6 files above, which we will use in the email templates. For example, you would be providing back to us:

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Alteration Schedule_Email Header.jpg

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Cancellation_Email Header.jpg

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Footer Ocean Underwriting_Logo_RGB.jpg

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Free Text Email Header_Blank.jpg

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Policy Schedule_Email Header.jpg

https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/Logos/Quotation_Email Header.jpg
